notes: 2-train LNG liquefaction facility with marine loading. 48-month duration. Largest bid in company history. JV with Bechtel for process engineering.

notes: 8.5 miles levee construction. 5 detention basins. 3 pump stations. Environmental compliance critical. 42-month duration with seasonal restrictions.
